headline: Vaccine stocks tumble: Moderna, Novavax, Pfizer fall after top FDA official resigns over RFK Jr. anti-vax views
summary: The health agency’s top immunization official announced the move Monday in protest, citing Secretary Kennedy’s ‘misinformation and lies.’

raw.headline: Vaccine stocks tumble: Moderna, Novavax, Pfizer fall after top FDA official resigns over RFK Jr. anti-vax views
raw.summary: The health agency’s top immunization official announced the move Monday in protest, citing Secretary Kennedy’s ‘misinformation and lies.’

headline: FDA Shake-Up Rocks Moderna Stock As Regulatory Risks Mount (Downgrade)
summary: Moderna stock dips 10% amid FDA resignation, signaling regulatory risks. Strong cash reserves can't offset competitive and mRNA challenges. Learn more on MRNA stock here.

raw.headline: FDA Shake-Up Rocks Moderna Stock As Regulatory Risks Mount (Downgrade)

headline: Moderna, Novavax Stocks Fall After Top FDA Vaccine Official Forced Out
summary: Shares in Moderna and Novavax fell Monday, following a Wall Street Journal report that the Food and Drug Administration’s top vaccine official has been pushed out. Shares in some larger drugmakers, such as GSK, also retreated.

raw.headline: Moderna, Novavax Stocks Fall After Top FDA Vaccine Official Forced Out
raw.summary: Shares in Moderna and Novavax fell Monday, following a Wall Street Journal report that the Food and Drug Administration’s top vaccine official has been pushed out. Shares in some larger drugmakers, such as GSK, also retreated.
